backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor defining admin login, access control, storage mixins, and all data types and maps for clients, transporters, loads, and tracking.
feature_evidence.json: JSON report mapping features to affected frontend files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of concise summaries for many frontend files describing their roles in routing, UI, auth, forms, and load management.
frontend/.gitignore: Git ignore rules for node modules, build artifacts, IDE files, Capacitor outputs, and Android signing files.
frontend/ADMIN_ACCESS.md: Documentation explaining password-based admin authentication, token flow, route protection, and backend integration.
frontend/ANDROID_BUILD.md: Guide for building Android APK/AAB files and preparing them for Play Store publishing, including prerequisites and steps.
frontend/capacitor.config.ts: Capacitor configuration defining app IDs, build directories, Android HTTPS scheme, and keystore-based signing options.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base file defining theme variables, dark mode styles, and shared utility customizations.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/scripts/android/_signing-env.ex: Template environment file showing required variables for Android signing credentials.
frontend/scripts/android/build-debug-apk: Builds a debug Android APK by validating prerequisites, building the web app, syncing Capacitor, and running Gradle assembleDebug.
frontend/scripts/android/build-release-a: Builds a signed release AAB for Play Store upload, checking signing env vars and running Gradle bundleRelease.
Builds a signed release APK for distribution outside Play Store using provided keystore credentials.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the app with React Query, theme provider, router, and global toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminAssig: Provides a dropdown UI for assigning verified transporters to a load using backend mutations.
Displays pending and approved loads in tabbed tables, each with controls to assign transporters.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminClien: Dialog for viewing and editing client details, updating verification status, and deleting clients.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminConta: Dialog for viewing contact message details and deleting the message via backend mutation.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminContr: Displays a table of client-posted contracts with text, year, and formatted start/end dates, fetched via useGetContracts().
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminLoadD: Provides a dialog for admins to view, update, approve/reject, or delete a specific load, including editing price and assigning clients or transporters.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminOpera: Renders the main admin panel with tabs for clients, transporters, pending and approved loads, contacts, contracts, pricing, and related detail dialogs.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminPrice: Manages load pricing configurations, allowing admins to add, edit, and delete rate entries via dialogs.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminTrans: Dialog for viewing and editing transporter details, updating verification status, or deleting the transporter.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminYears: Allows admins to add or remove available years for contract selection and displays the current sorted list of years.
frontend/src/components/admin/LocationEv: Fetches and displays transporter-submitted location evidence with timestamps, coordinates, and image previews.
frontend/src/components/admin/Transporte: Shows a detailed list of transporters with contact info, truck type, live location, and status freshness indicators.
Provides filters for hiding transporters without locations and selecting by truck type.
Displays transporters with location data in a simple grid-based map view with expandable details.
Combines filters, map view, and list view to manage and display transporter locations and statuses.
frontend/src/components/ads/AdSnippetPre: Renders an ad snippet inside an iframe with load/error detection and optional diagnostics overlay.
frontend/src/components/ads/BottomAd.tsx: Displays a dismissible bottom advertisement using stored settings and an iframe preview.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Displays an access denied message with support contact info and buttons to return home or go to admin login.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminContac: Shows a dialog with detailed contact message info and placeholder delete functionality.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminRouteE: Error boundary that catches admin route errors and offers retry by invalidating auth-related queries.
Presents an admin access error screen with retry and sign‑out actions that clear auth state.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminSignIn: Prompts users to sign in with admin credentials and provides a support contact link.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Handles Internet Identity login/logout with loading states and optional post‑login callback.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal for new users to enter name and email and submit a profile creation request.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAdmi: Protects admin routes by verifying admin status, handling errors, and redirecting unauthorized users.
frontend/src/components/control-center/A: Admin section for editing the Android APK download link and managing ad settings.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Site footer with company info, navigation links, regional coverage, and attribution link.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Root page layout rendering the top navigation, main content outlet, bottom ad, and footer.
frontend/src/components/layout/TopNav.ts: Top navigation bar with links, login handling, admin options, and responsive mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/loads/LoadIntere: Dialog for capturing geolocation and uploading a screenshot as evidence when expressing load interest.
frontend/src/components/loads/LoadLocati: Displays pickup and drop-off locations with icons if provided.
frontend/src/components/transporter/Live: Card allowing transporters to start or stop live location sharing with status and error indicators.
frontend/src/components/transporter/Tran: Card for viewing and updating transporter operational status with validation and mutation handling.
frontend/src/config/adminBootstrap.ts: Provides functions to read and compare the bootstrap admin principal from environment variables.
frontend/src/config/ads.ts: Defines ad configuration and utilities for loading and saving bottom ad settings in localStorage.
frontend/src/config/download.ts: Reads a fallback Android APK download URL from environment variables.
frontend/src/constants/adminToken.ts: Exports constants for admin token storage and change event names.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and caches a backend actor based on Internet Identity and initializes admin access.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminAccess.ts: Hooks for granting admin access and performing bootstrap admin assignment with query invalidations.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminToken.ts: Tracks the admin token from sessionStorage and updates reactively via a custom event listener.
Provides functions and a hook to verify admin access by initializing the actor with a token and checking admin status.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuth.ts: Aggregates identity, user profile, role, and admin checks to provide overall authentication and state flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity auth context, loading identities, handling login/logout, and exposing auth state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for backend interactions including contact, admin verification, client data, and other domain operations.
frontend/src/hooks/useTransporterLiveLoc: Manages live geolocation updates for transporters, periodically sending location to the backend with error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Provides hooks to fetch and update the caller’s user profile and role using authenticated actor calls.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining design tokens, dark mode variables, and base/reset styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point initializing React, React Query, and the Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders an about page detailing company story, mission, values, and regional coverage with styled cards.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Displays the admin dashboard with sign‑out handling and tabs for managing platform operations.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPasswordLoginPag: Implements admin password login with token storage, actor reinitialization, and admin access verification.
frontend/src/pages/ClientRegistrationPag: Provides a client registration form that loads existing data, submits registration, and shows verification status.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Contains a contact form that sends user messages and displays company contact information.
frontend/src/pages/ContractsPage.tsx: Allows verified users to post and browse contracts, including year filtering and validation logic.
frontend/src/pages/ControlCenterPage.tsx: Admin-only page showing app configuration settings and platform management tabs, wrapped in admin auth and error boundaries.
frontend/src/pages/DownloadPage.tsx: Displays Android APK download link using backend or fallback URL with loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Public landing page with hero section, company info, testimonials, and CTAs for clients and transporters.
frontend/src/pages/LoadBoardPage.tsx: Authenticated load board for viewing transporter loads and posting new loads with validation and API integration.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Lists platform services and explains the workflow for posting and matching freight loads.
frontend/src/pages/TransporterRegistrati: Form for transporters to register or edit details with document upload, contract info, and verification handling.
frontend/src/routeTree.tsx: Defines the TanStack Router route tree, mapping all app pages including Control Center and admin routes using hash-based routing.
frontend/src/utils/csv.ts: Provides a utility to convert an array of objects into CSV format and trigger a browser download.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Implements helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS with custom colors, fonts, animations, and plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Describes current project state, known issues, and feature requests focused on building an in-app Control Center to replace the missing admin panel.
